body:
"What and Who is The Jiff?" (jeff)
==================================
Basically, every 30 days, ill be changing my account name but it will always have "TheJiff" in it...
now how do i decide who should be TheJiff? just reply with the IGN/name of that person and
tell me why he/she is The Jiff? - LokighTheJiff
==================================

p.s. Lokigh is Jiff #3EGGSORRIOT!




l

title: TheJiff!
